body:
```
$ otool -L /Users/davydden/spack/opt/spack/darwin-mojave-x86_64/clang-10.0.0-apple/superlu-dist-5.3.0-htzdmatut7uxotmk4w5fy7hnvi46kzck/lib/libsuperlu_dist.dylib | grep blas
	/Users/davydden/spack/opt/spack/darwin-mojave-x86_64/clang-10.0.0-apple/superlu-dist-5.3.0-htzdmatut7uxotmk4w5fy7hnvi46kzck/lib/libblas.dylib (compatibility version 0.0.0, current version 0.0.0)
```
most likely introduced during the switch to CMake https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/9445

@gchavez2 @balay please see if you can fix this.
title: superlu-dist does not use Spack's blas
